impact-statement: A novel Mendelian disease featuring early-onset hypertension is caused by a recurrent gain of function mutation in <italic>CACNA1H</italic>, which encodes the voltage-gated calcium channel Cav3.2.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
